original_text: Nobody can hide the things that he does from God. Do not think a false thought like that! It is like a farmer who plants seeds in his field. The same kind of crops will grow as the seeds which he plants. That will be his harvest.
korean_text: 스스로 속이지 말라 하나님은 업신여김을 받지 아니하시나니 사람이 무엇으로 심든지 그대로 거두리라

sentences.original_text: Nobody can hide the things that he does
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 자기가 하는 일들을 숨길 수 없다

sentences.original_text: Do not think a false thought like that
It is like a farmer who plants seeds
The same kind of crops will grow
as the seeds which he plants
